name: Romance of Three Kingdoms UI Motifs - Ornaments and Assets
description: Generate UI ornament assets in Romance of Three Kingdoms style: parchment textures, embossed gold trims, brocade patterns, seal stamps, icon frames, borders, and decorative elements.

style_reference.primary_inspiration: KOEI Tecmo ROTK game UI, Dynasty Warriors interface, traditional Chinese decorative arts

visual_characteristics.materials: Bronze, jade, gold leaf, lacquered wood, silk brocade, aged parchment
visual_characteristics.motifs: Dragons, phoenixes, cloud scrolls, geometric patterns, Chinese characters
visual_characteristics.finish: Embossed relief, metallic sheen, translucent jade quality
visual_characteristics.style: Ornate but readable, game UI quality, clean edges

style_prompt_block: Romance of Three Kingdoms game UI art, KOEI Tecmo quality, professional game asset design, Han dynasty Chinese decorative aesthetic, ornate but readable, clean sharp edges, isolated UI element
negative_prompt_block: blurry edges, low quality, amateur, modern design, western style, cartoon, messy details, background clutter, text, watermark, photorealistic, 3D render plastic look

prompt_templates.base_composition: UI asset design, isolated element on transparent background, professional game asset quality, clean edges suitable for game UI

asset_type_prompts.corner_ornament: ornate corner bracket design, L-shaped corner decoration, symmetrical design, dimensional embossed relief, suitable for panel corners
asset_type_prompts.border_horizontal: horizontal border strip design, seamless tileable pattern, decorative edge trim, consistent height, suitable for panel edges
asset_type_prompts.border_vertical: vertical border strip design, seamless tileable pattern, decorative edge trim, consistent width, suitable for panel sides
asset_type_prompts.panel_background: panel background texture, semi-transparent overlay quality, subtle pattern, suitable for UI panel backdrop, 9-slice ready
asset_type_prompts.medallion_seal: circular medallion seal design, official stamp appearance, central emblem area, ornate outer ring, authority symbol
asset_type_prompts.icon_frame_square: square icon frame design, clear center area for icon placement, decorative border, suitable for 64-128px icons
asset_type_prompts.icon_frame_circle: circular icon frame design, clear center area for icon placement, ring border decoration, suitable for status icons
asset_type_prompts.ribbon_banner: flowing ribbon banner design, text-ready surface, decorative ends, dynamic curved composition, suitable for labels
asset_type_prompts.divider_ornate: ornate horizontal divider design, symmetrical from center, elegant separation element, decorative flourishes
asset_type_prompts.button_frame: button frame design, pressable appearance, clear center for text, beveled edges suggesting depth, interactive element
asset_type_prompts.scroll_end: decorative scroll end ornament, rolled paper suggestion, mounting hardware detail, document aesthetic
asset_type_prompts.stamp_seal: official stamp seal design, square or circular, Chinese character placeholder center, ink stamp appearance, authority mark

material_prompts.bronze_gold: burnished bronze base with gold leaf highlights, metallic embossed texture, warm metal tones, aged patina hints
material_prompts.jade_green: translucent jade green quality, smooth polished surface, precious stone appearance, subtle inner glow, gold mounting accents
material_prompts.lacquer_red: deep lacquered red finish, glossy reflective surface, traditional Chinese lacquerware, gold or black accents
material_prompts.parchment: aged parchment paper texture, warm cream and tan tones, subtle fiber grain, ink wash edges, antique document quality
material_prompts.silk_brocade: rich silk brocade fabric texture, woven pattern visible, luxurious textile quality, subtle sheen, embroidered accents
material_prompts.dark_iron: dark iron metal finish, strong and imposing, subtle blue-black tones, military fortress aesthetic, minimal ornamentation

motif_prompts.dragon: dragon motif design, coiled or profile dragon, scales and claws detailed, imperial power symbol, auspicious clouds
motif_prompts.phoenix: phoenix motif design, graceful bird in flight, elaborate tail feathers, renewal and empress symbol, flame accents
motif_prompts.cloud_scroll: auspicious cloud scroll pattern, flowing cloud shapes, traditional Chinese cloud motifs, ethereal quality
motif_prompts.geometric: geometric interlocking pattern, traditional Chinese geometric design, precise mathematical beauty, endless knot influence
motif_prompts.floral: floral motif pattern, lotus, peony, or plum blossoms, natural elegance, growth and beauty symbols
motif_prompts.wave: wave pattern design, flowing water motifs, traditional Chinese wave style, power and persistence symbol
motif_prompts.mountain: mountain motif design, layered peak silhouettes, stability and permanence symbol, landscape reference
motif_prompts.character_seal: Chinese character seal style, calligraphic character center, official document aesthetic, scholarly authority
motif_prompts.plain_elegant: plain elegant design, minimal ornamentation, refined simplicity, sophisticated restraint, quality over quantity

complexity_prompts.simple: simple clean design, minimal detail, clear readable form, functional elegance
complexity_prompts.moderate: moderate detail level, balanced ornamentation, clear structure with decorative elements
complexity_prompts.ornate: ornate detailed design, rich decorative elements, intricate patterns, luxurious appearance
complexity_prompts.elaborate: highly elaborate design, maximum detail, complex interlocking patterns, imperial grandeur level

workflow_notes: This workflow generates UI elements for game interface. For transparent backgrounds, post-processing with background removal is recommended. Tileable textures may require additional seamless processing. Generated at 512x512 base, scale as needed.
